name: Code Breaker (Psonbre)
description:
Code Breaker is a remake of an earlier game I made 3-4 years ago, you can try it, but I can't guarantee you'll like it ;). It is still in a work in progress, the dialogues are not yet completed and we still have more levels to design but the game is fully functional!

This is a coop project with my friend Philou213 who wrote the dialogues and helped me with game/level design.

CONTROLS

  • WAD to move
  • Space to enter hacking mode
  • Mouse to interact with objects during hacking mode

The game was designed to work with a mouse and keyboard, using a track pad is possible but that might make the game harder !

NEED HELP ?

If you're stuck, a walkthrough will soon be available on our YouTube channel! Until then you can message me on discord (Psonbre#4023) if you need help!

FUTURE UPDATES

  • A level editor for sharing and playing levels made by other players.
  • Controller support.

KNOWN BUGS

  • They’re features ;)
